meanings.definition: Tending to produce conformity by violent or arbitrary means.
meanings.sent1: The procrustean rules in the classroom forced all students to act the same way.
meanings.sent2: The procrustean dress code required everyone to wear the exact same uniform.
meanings.sent3: The procrustean coach made all the players follow a strict training regimen.
meanings.sent4: The procrustean policies of the company stifled creativity and individuality.
meanings.sent5: The procrustean restrictions on social media use limited employees' freedom.

meanings.definition: Marked by arbitrary often ruthless disregard of individual differences or special circumstances.
meanings.sent1: The procrustean manager never considered the unique strengths of each team member.
meanings.sent2: The procrustean decision to cut costs resulted in layoffs without any consideration for personal situations.
meanings.sent3: The procrustean chef refused to make any modifications to the menu for dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent4: The procrustean ruler imposed harsh punishments on all citizens regardless of their circumstances.
meanings.sent5: The procrustean approach to problem-solving ignored the specific needs of each case.
